special_text:
Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.
[i](Activate each submodule once as a sorcery. When this enters, activate one submodule for free.)[/i]
{B}{B}{B}: Ambitous
Search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle. You lose 3 life.
{B}{B}{B}: Ruthless
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
{B}{B}{B}: Determined
Power Module gains “At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.”
notes: !inpend Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.\\n/replace/
